Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: நல்லாறு எனப்படுவது யாதெனின் யாதொன்றும்கொல்லாமை சூழும் நெறி.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: What is the good way? It is the path which considers killing nothing.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is walking along a path. The path is luminous, beautiful, and straight, and it is explicitly labeled 'The Good Path' ('நல் ஆறு').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The defining characteristic of this path is that it is a path of absolute harmlessness. All living creatures—deer, birds, insects—can rest on the path itself without any fear. The path is a moving sanctuary.
Layered_Composition.Background: The very principle or 'way' ('நெறி') that guides this path is shown as a great, overarching law inscribed in the sky: 'Consider the killing of anything to be evil' ('யாதொன்றும் கொல்லாமை சூழும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The 'Good Path' in life is defined as the way of living that is based on the principle of never contemplating harm to any living creature.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The path as a moving sanctuary is the key visual. The animals resting safely *on* the path show its inherent harmlessness. The law in the sky shows the guiding principle behind this way of life.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A gentle, pure, and benevolent light illuminates the scene. The Good Path glows with a soft, white-gold light. The animals are peaceful. The palette is one of absolute serenity and safety.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A tracking shot that follows the person walking along the beautiful, safe path, with the animals resting peacefully upon it.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a focus on the peaceful harmony between the walker and all other life.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Fantasy realism, with a utopian feel.
